name: Wh6t's D6 Numb6? CLASSIC
description:
THIS IS THE ORIGINAL 2016 CLASSIC VERSION NEVER RELEASED UNTIL NOW

I was pretty new to making games when I made this.

Get the 2018 version here: https://kompakt.itch.io/whats-da-numba

You play as Chad; you're a douchebag. You're really bored, you can't find your brother, so you decided to go outside and prank your Chinese neighbor by ringing her doorbell many times until she's fed up.
You then sneak behind her house, only to be interrupted by her husband, who is upset about his hair getting sprayed polka dots by his wife. He then tells you to go away. You go in anyways,
the lady gets pissed of at you, and sends you to Hell.





Since you're here, have this video of the very first prototype of What's Da Numba:
